verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Make <WH6213> <WH8798> thee two <WH8147> shofars <WH2689> of silver <WH3701>; of a whole piece <WH4749> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH8799> them: that thou mayest use <WH1961> <WH8804> them for the calling <WH4744> of the assembly <WH5712>, and for the journeying <WH4550> of the camps <WH4264>.

And when they shall blow <WH8628> <WH8804> with them <WH2004>, all the assembly <WH5712> shall assemble <WH3259> <WH8738> themselves to thee at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And if they blow <WH8628> <WH8799> but with one <WH259> shofar, then the princes <WH5387>, which are heads <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, shall gather <WH3259> <WH8738> themselves unto thee.
When ye blow <WH8628> <WH8804> an alarm <WH8643>, then the camps <WH4264> that lie <WH2583> <WH8802> on the east parts <WH6924> shall go forward <WH5265> <WH8804>.

When ye blow <WH8628> <WH8804> an alarm <WH8643> the second time <WH8145>, then the camps <WH4264> that lie <WH2583> <WH8802> on the south side <WH8486> shall take their journey <WH5265> <WH8804>: they shall blow <WH8628> <WH8799> an alarm <WH8643> for their journeys <WH4550>.
But when the congregation <WH6951> is to be gathered together <WH6950> <WH8687>, ye shall blow <WH8628> <WH8799>, but ye shall not sound an alarm <WH7321> <WH8686>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Aharon <WH175>, the Kohanim <WH3548>, shall blow <WH8628> <WH8799> with the shofars <WH2689>; and they shall be to you for an ordinance <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755>.

And if ye go <WH935> <WH8799> to war <WH4421> in your land <WH776> against <WH6862> the enemy that oppresseht <WH6887> <WH8802> you, then ye shall blow an alarm <WH7321> <WH8689> with the shofars <WH2689>; and ye shall be remembered <WH2142> <WH8738> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, and ye shall be saved <WH3467> <WH8738> from your enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.

Also in the day <WH3117> of your gladness <WH8057>, and in your solemn days <WH4150>, and in the beginnings <WH7218> of your months <WH2320>, ye shall blow <WH8628> <WH8804> with the shofars <WH2689> over your burnt offerings <WH5930>, and over the sacrifices <WH2077> of your peace offerings <WH8002>; that they may be to you for a memorial <WH2146> before <WH6440> your 'Elohim <WH430>: I am the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.

And it came to pass on the twentieth <WH6242> day of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320>, in the second <WH8145> year <WH8141>, that the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> <WH8738> from off the tabernacle <WH4908> of the testimony <WH5715>.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> took <WH5265> <WH8799> their journeys <WH4550> out of the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>; and the cloud <WH6051> rested <WH7931> <WH8799> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran <WH6290>.
And they first <WH7223> took their journey <WH5265> <WH8799> according to the Mitzvah <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872>.

In the first <WH7223> place went <WH5265> <WH8799> the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Y'hudah <WH3063> according to their armies <WH6635>: and over his host was Nachshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab <WH5992>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Yissakhar <WH3485> was Nethaneel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar <WH6686>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Z'vulun <WH2074> was Eliab <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Helon <WH2497>.

And the tabernacle <WH4908> was taken down <WH3381> <WH8717>; and the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> and the sons <WH1121> of M'rari <WH4847> set forward <WH5265> <WH8804>, bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> the tabernacle <WH4908>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of Re'uven <WH7205> set forward <WH5265> <WH8804> according to their armies <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Elizur <WH468> the son <WH1121> of Shedeur <WH7707>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of SHim`on <WH8095> was Shelumiel <WH8017> the son <WH1121> of Zurishaddai <WH6701>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> was Eliyahaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Deuel <WH1845>.

And the K'hatis <WH6956> set forward <WH5265> <WH8804>, bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> the sanctuary <WH4720>: and the other did set up <WH6965> <WH8689> the tabernacle <WH4908> against they came <WH935> <WH8800>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669> set forward <WH5265> <WH8804> according to their armies <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Elishama <WH476> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud <WH5989>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519> was Gamli'el <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur <WH6301>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Binyamin <WH1144> was Abidan <WH27> the son <WH1121> of Gid`oni <WH1441>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> set forward <WH5265> <WH8804>, which was the rereward <WH622> <WH8764> of all the camps <WH4264> throughout their hosts <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Ahiezer <WH295> the son <WH1121> of Ammishaddai <WH5996>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> was Pagiel <WH6295> the son <WH1121> of Ocran <WH5918>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Naftali <WH5321> was Ahira <WH299> the son <WH1121> of Enan <WH5881>.
Thus were <WH428> the journeyings <WH4550> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> according to their armies <WH6635>, when they set forward <WH5265> <WH8799>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Hobab <WH2246>, the son <WH1121> of Raguel <WH7467> the Midianite <WH4084>, Mosheh <WH4872> ' father in Torah <WH2859> <WH8802>, We are journeying <WH5265> <WH8802> unto the place <WH4725> of which the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8804>, I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> it you: come <WH3212> <WH8798> thou with us, and we will do thee good <WH2895> <WH8689>: for the YY <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> good <WH2896> concerning Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, I will not go <WH3212> <WH8799>; but I will depart <WH3212> <WH8799> to mine own land <WH776>, and to my kindred <WH4138>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Leave <WH5800> <WH8799> us not, I pray thee; forasmuch as thou knowest <WH3651> <WH3045> <WH8804> how we are to encamp <WH2583> <WH8800> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and thou mayest be to us instead of eyes <WH5869>.

And it shall be, if thou go <WH3212> <WH8799> with us, yea, it shall be, that what goodness <WH2896> the YY <WH3068> shall do <WH3190> <WH8686> unto us, the same will we do <WH2895> <WH8689> unto thee.

And they departed <WH5265> <WH8799> from the mount <WH2022> of the YY <WH3068> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ' journey <WH1870>: and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> went <WH5265> <WH8802> before <WH6440> them in the three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ' journey <WH1870>, to search out <WH8446> <WH8800> a resting place <WH4496> for them.
And the cloud <WH6051> of the YY <WH3068> was upon them by day <WH3119>, when they went out <WH5265> <WH8800> of the camp <WH4264>.

And it came to pass, when the ark <WH727> set forward <WH5265> <WH8800>, that Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Rise up <WH6965> <WH8798>, YY <WH3068>, and let thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802> be scattered <WH6327> <WH8799>; and let them that hate <WH8130> <WH8764> thee flee <WH5127> <WH8799> before <WH6440> thee.
And when it rested <WH5117> <WH8800>, he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Return <WH7725> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, unto the many <WH7233> thousands <WH505> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
